title: IRON MAIDEN Plays To Record 70,000 Fans In London
description: Glasgow is up next! The post IRON MAIDEN Plays To Record 70,000 Fans In London appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Isabella Ambrosio
byline: By Isabella Ambrosio Published 5 hours ago
text: After 50 years, Iron Maiden have just broken their record for amount of fans played to during a headlining show in their home country on their Run For Your Lives tour. Iron Maiden played 17 songs to a reported 70,000 to 75,000 fans in London last night, June 28th. This is Iron Maiden's largest headlining gig in their home country, both due to the size of the stadium, and the amount of fans in attendance. Fans captured several videos, which you can find below, with the setlist and the schedule for their Run For Your Lives tour. Run For Your Lives Setlist Murders In The Rue Morgue Wrathchild Killers Phantom Of The Opera The Number Of The Beast The Clairvoyant Powerslave 2 Minutes To Midnight Rime Of The Ancient Mariner Run To The Hills Seventh Son Of A Seventh Son The Trooper Hallowed Be Thy Name Iron Maiden Aces High Fear Of The Dark Wasted Years Run For Your Life Tour ScheduleJune 30th – Glasgow, Scotland @ OVO HydroJuly 3rd – Belfort, France @ Eurockéennes FestivalJuly 5th – Madrid, Spain @ Riyadh Air MetropolitanoJuly 6th – Lisbon, Portugal @ MEO ArenaJuly 9th – Zurich, Switzerland @ HallenstadionJuly 11th – Gelsenkirchen, Germany @ Veltins-ArenaJuly 13th – Padova, Italy @ Stadio EuganeoJuly 15th – Bremen, Germany @ BürgerweideJuly 17th – Vienna, Austria @ Ernst Happel StadiumJuly 19th – Paris, France @ Paris La Défense ArenaJuly 20th – Paris, France @ Paris La Défense ArenaJuly 23rd – Arnhem, Netherlands @ GelreDomeJuly 25th – Frankfurt, Germany @ Deutsche Bank ParkJuly 26th – Stuttgart, Germany @ Cannstatter WasenJuly 29th – Berlin, Germany @ WaldbühneJuly 30th – Berlin, Germany @ WaldbühneAugust 2nd – Warsaw, Poland @ PGE Narodowy Want More Metal? html:
After 50 years, Iron Maiden have just broken their record for amount of fans played to during a headlining show in their home country on their Run For Your Lives tour.

Iron Maiden played 17 songs to a reported 70,000 to 75,000 fans in London last night, June 28th.

This is Iron Maiden's largest headlining gig in their home country, both due to the size of the stadium, and the amount of fans in attendance.

Fans captured several videos, which you can find below, with the setlist and the schedule for their Run For Your Lives tour.

Run For Your Lives Setlist

  1. Murders In The Rue Morgue
  1. Wrathchild
  2. Killers
  3. Phantom Of The Opera
  4. The Number Of The Beast
  5. The Clairvoyant
  6. Powerslave
  7. 2 Minutes To Midnight
  8. Rime Of The Ancient Mariner
  9. Run To The Hills
  10. Seventh Son Of A Seventh Son
  11. The Trooper
  12. Hallowed Be Thy Name
  13. Iron Maiden
  14. Aces High
  15. Fear Of The Dark
  16. Wasted Years

Run For Your Life Tour Schedule
June 30th – Glasgow, Scotland @ OVO Hydro
July 3rd – Belfort, France @ Eurockéennes Festival
July 5th – Madrid, Spain @ Riyadh Air Metropolitano
July 6th – Lisbon, Portugal @ MEO Arena
July 9th – Zurich, Switzerland @ Hallenstadion
July 11th – Gelsenkirchen, Germany @ Veltins-Arena
July 13th – Padova, Italy @ Stadio Euganeo
July 15th – Bremen, Germany @ Bürgerweide
July 17th – Vienna, Austria @ Ernst Happel Stadium
July 19th – Paris, France @ Paris La Défense Arena
July 20th – Paris, France @ Paris La Défense Arena
July 23rd – Arnhem, Netherlands @ GelreDome
July 25th – Frankfurt, Germany @ Deutsche Bank Park
July 26th – Stuttgart, Germany @ Cannstatter Wasen
July 29th – Berlin, Germany @ Waldbühne
July 30th – Berlin, Germany @ Waldbühne
August 2nd – Warsaw, Poland @ PGE Narodowy
